title: Leave.EU under fire for 'racist' advert calling Angela Merkel a 'kraut'
text:
Brexit campaign group Leave.EU has come under fire from politicians across the political spectrum over a "racist" and "insulting" advert that called Angela Merkel a “kraut”.

The poster, shared across the group's online channels, shows the German Chancellor with her hand raised aloft in a pose not dissimilar to a Nazi salute.

"We didn’t win two world wars to be pushed around by a kraut,” the attack ad states in large capital letters.

Michael Gove responded to the outrage in the House of Commons this afternoon, saying he wanted to “entirely disassociate myself from any sort of racist or demeaning language towards Germany”.
